Mogreet helps brands deliver videos, images and text messages to their customers' mobile devices to drive sales, increased consumer engagement and build long-term loyalty. Leveraging our proprietary cloud-based technology infrastructure, our SMS and MMS messaging platform enables any type of content, message, advertisement or coupon to be delivered to every mobile consumer regardless of carrier, handset or region. From single marketing campaigns (i.e. sweepstakes, polls, trivia, etc.) to mobile alerts to mobile CRM, Mogreet's platform enables businesses of all sizes to communicate with their customers on mobile devices. Learn more at http://www.mogreet.com
